title: Islamic banking app - Business - DAWN.COM
content:
KARACHI: BankIslami has launched ‘aik’, Pakistan’s first fully digital Islamic banking solution, said a press release on Thursday.

“The app designed to deliver seamless, Shariah-compliant financial services nationwide marks a major step in the digital evolution of ethical banking,” said the bank.

It is available for download on Google Play and the Apple App Store.

Published in Dawn, March 21st, 2025
